sourcesContent:
import "./EventItem.css"; const EventItem = (props) => { function capitalizeFirstLetter(string) { return string.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + string.slice(1); } return (

{props.author}

@{props.author.split('-')[0]}

{props.sport}#{props.level}
{capitalizeFirstLetter(props.city)} {props.location.length >= 2 ? Place: {props.location} : null}
{props.description}

  • Date

    {props.date}

  • Start:

    {props.time}

  • Joined

    {props.nrPlayers}

  • Who can join:

    {props.allowed === 'Everyone' ? 'Everyone' : `${props.level}`}

); }; export default EventItem;
